About Me

Let me tell you about myself...

BIO

I am an IT professional with 3+ years experience in Front End Web Development & Business Analysis. I have worked with a number of modern web technologies from vanilla HTML, CSS and JavaScript to advanced web frameworks like AngularJS, Node.js, Bootstrap, Materialize and jQuery. I have also had some exposure to React, PHP and .Net development as I like to keep up to date with technologies by taking courses in my spare time.

I have worked in a variety of environments, as part of an Agile development team and also as the sole web resource for companies and clients. I have a real passion for front end development and am always on the lookout for new opportunities to up-skill expand my knowledge base.

Excehquer Software BMI

Web Consultant

As Excehquer's Web Consultant, I manage client's eCommerce requirements from start to finish. I lead requirements gathering and analysis and then deliver professional CMS solutions through a mix of the company's CMS solution and bespoke develop, going beyond simple configuration to deliver the best solution for Excehquer's customers.

I also manage the company's marketing web suite, their brochure microsites and main website. I am currently leading the redesign of all of these, giving Exchequer to an up-to-date modern web stack.

123.ie

Front-End Developer

At 123, I was the leader in delivering high quality user interfaces using AngularJS, bootstrap and SASS. I learned how to integrate these front end technologies within a JSP server side application by working closely with the Java development team. During my time at 123 I also developed a close working relationship with the marketing department to ensure business requirement could be translated and delivered by the development team, and often assisted with marketing tools such as Drupal, Adobe Target and Google Tag Manager

I also had the opportunity to develop an internal tool using AngularJS with .Net MVC technologies, working directly with the Software Developer Manager on a time sensitive delivery.

At 123 I also gained working knowledge and exposure to agile development management tools like JIRA and deployment and build tools like Jenkins and NPM.

SmartSimple Software

Team Lead, Business Analyst & Implementation Specialist

At SmartSimple I managed a number of client accounts where I translated business needs into working solutions. I drove requirements gathering sessions & Sales demonstrations and was the Lead BA on a number of high-profile client systems in Government, Health and Education sectors.

I specialised in creating a baseline system skeleton for use in bespoke demos and to lay the groundwork for quick deployment for new customers. As a Team Lead I conducted training sessions and paired learning sessions for newly onboarded staff.

I also compiled a curriculum for intense technical training session for clients, which I've conduction on site and remotely.
